#summary Information on accessing or obtaining Scion's source code.

= Source Code =

Scion uses [http://git-scm.com/ Git] to manage its source code.

The main repository is hosted on [http://github.com GitHub].

  * [http://github.com/nominolo/scion Browse Scion's source code]
  
  * Get a local copy of Scion via
    {{{
    git clone git://github.com/nominolo/scion
    }}}
